name: Manny's Week
summary: Manny's Week is a project taken on by a couple close friends using the engine Construct 2. It's intended to be a surreal experience through a particularly turbulent week of an increasingly unstable life.
storyline: Manny wakes up to his roommates breaking some concerning news to him. Doesn't he have enough to deal with already? Manny, already in an unstable state of mind needs to help his roommates come up with rent money. But as the days progress, Manny's grip on reality starts to loosen.
